Update
                                                                                                                            According to our internal inspection conducted on 13 June 2025, the overall project’s progress is 99.6%. As per the Real Estate Regulatory Agency (RERA), the progress reported is 90.26%, based on an inspection conducted on 31 January 2025.
15 min from Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa
12 min from Dubai International Financial Center
